code: import ActionTypes from"../constants/action-types";export var setProducts=function setProducts(products){return{type:ActionTypes.SET_PRODUCT,payload:products};};export var selectedProducts=function selectedProducts(products){return{type:ActionTypes.SELECTED_PRODUCT,payload:products};};export var removeSelectedProducts=function removeSelectedProducts(){return{type:ActionTypes.REMOVE_SELECTED_PRODUCT};};
